about.title: Kashef: Your Digital Shield
about.why_text:
In today's digital world, words can be both a weapon and a liability. Syrians face daily challenges in expressing themselves; strict laws and random ban algorithms mean one post could ban your account or put you at risk.

"Kashef" is not here to restrict you, but to protect you. We believe in your right to express yourself, intelligently. Using advanced AI, we scan your content before you post, alerting you to potential "traps" and suggesting safer alternatives to convey your ideas without compromising your safety.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.amnesia_desc: We strictly apply the "Amnesia" principle. Once you close the app, all your text and analysis results are wiped from RAM instantly. We have no database, no archives, and no history logs.
privacy.local_desc: Severe keywords (vulgar insults, drugs, weapons) are scanned locally on your device without internet. This ensures speed and minimizes data transfer.
privacy.cloud_desc: For complex contexts (political/news), text is encrypted and sent to Groq AI for analysis only, without metadata (no name, no location, no IP). Text is deleted from servers immediately after response.
privacy.tracking_desc: We do not require accounts, location access, or ad IDs. You are completely anonymous to us.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.alert_desc: This app is a technical advisory tool, not a legal guarantee.
terms.point1_desc: Kashef relies on AI, which can make mistakes. A "Safe" result is not a 100% legal guarantee, and a "Risk" result is a precaution.
terms.point2_desc: You are solely responsible for the content you post. Kashef is only an awareness tool.
terms.point3_desc: Strictly prohibited: Using this app to evade detection for criminal/terrorist content or drug promotion. It is designed to protect civilians, journalists, and peaceful activists.
terms.point4_desc: Social media algorithms change constantly. we try to keep up but cannot guarantee our advice matches the latest Facebook updates instantly.
